013package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.commons.internal.StringUtils.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.commons.internal.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
019
020/**
021 * URL-encoding variable resolver.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * The format for this var is <js>"$UE{uriPart}"</js>.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * This variable takes the contents inside the variable and replaces it with a value returned by calling
028 * {@link StringUtils#urlEncode(String)}).
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Since this is a {@link SimpleVar}, any variables contained in the result will be recursively resolved.
032 * Likewise, if the arguments contain any variables, those will be resolved before they are passed to this var.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jm.SvlVariables">SVL Variables</a>
036 * </ul>
037 */
038public class UrlEncodeVar extends SimpleVar {
039
040   /** The name of this variable. */
041   public static final String NAME = "UE";
042
043   /**
044    * Constructor.
045    */
046   public UrlEncodeVar() {
047      super(NAME);
048   }
049
050   @Override /* Var */
051   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) {
052      return urlEncode(key);
053   }
054}
